title: President of the Republic holds phone conversation with his French counterpart
text: The President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune had, Friday afternoon, a phone conversation with the President of the French Republic, Mr. Emmanuel Macron, on a number of issues, including in particular the method with which a national holding dual Algerian-French nationality was exfiltrated by the French consular services in Tunisia, on the date of 06 February 2023.

The phone conversation has cleared up several ambiguities concerning this case that has caused dissension in bilateral relations. The two presidents agreed to strengthen the means of communication between the administrations of the two countries, in order to avoid the recurrence of such situations.
On this occasion, the President of the Republic informed his French counterpart of the forthcoming return of the Algerian ambassador to Paris.

The two presidents also discussed bilateral relations and the various ways to implement (the Algiers Declaration), signed between the two countries during President Macron's visit to Algeria last August.

The telephone conversation has, moreover, allowed to discuss ways and means to strengthen and promote cooperation between the two countries, including the state visit to be made by the President of the Republic in France, and to review regional and international issues of common interes.Â
